mapper.select: SELECT A.student_university_code, A.student_school_id, A.student_id, A.technology_id, A.review_id, A.code_standard_id, B.code_standard_name FROM shangshufang_customer.university_student_exercises_review_code_standard A INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.technology_code_standard B ON A.technology_id = B.technology_id AND A.code_standard_id = B.code_standard_id WHERE A.review_id = #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO shangshufang_customer.university_student_exercises_review_code_standard ( review_id, student_university_code, student_school_id, student_id, technology_id, code_standard_id,
create_user, update_user ) VALUES ( #{reviewID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentUniversityCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentSchoolID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{technologyID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{codeStandardID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
